page.title: 07THE VICAR OF KNEESALL
page.content: The Rev.Derek Hailes and his wife have lived at the Vicarage in Baulk Lane for just over a year. He used to live in Nottingham}.He thought it was less noisy than in Nottingham .In his Nottingham parish,there were twenty one thousand people and in{Kneesall} there are 167 adults and 32 children.We went in his study and there are three thousand books in his study and three quarters are to do with the church. He has got ten Bibles.He likes his work and especially he likes the services and the{Eucharist}best. The vicar has had six jobs and he is the captain of the{Church Army.}He was also a journalist and he has been to Spain,Germany,Denmark,and Norway. He likes living in Kneesall and working in the new united benefice that has just been created.
